ForestMagic.description: You are one with forest magic...
ForestMagic.name: Forest Magic

BearPaw.description: Blackberries and Salmonberries are worth 3x the gold.
BearPaw.name: Bear's Knowledge

SpringOnionMastery.description: Spring onions are worth 5x the gold.
SpringOnionMastery.name: Spring Onion Mastery

KeyToTheTown.description: Allows access to all buildings in town, at any time of day.
KeyToTheTown.name: Key To The Town

Book_PriceCatalogue.description: You can now see the value of your items.
Book_PriceCatalogue.name: Price Catalogue

Book_Marlon.description: You get a 50% discount on Marlon's item retrieval service.
Book_Marlon.name: Mapping Cave Systems

Book_Speed.description: You run a little bit faster.
Book_Speed.name: Way Of The Wind pt. 1

Book_Speed2.description: You run a little bit faster.
Book_Speed2.name: Way Of The Wind pt. 2

Book_Void.description: Monsters have a small chance to drop double loot.
Book_Void.name: Monster Compendium

Book_Friendship.description: You become friends with people a little faster.
Book_Friendship.name: Friendship 101

Book_Defense.name: Jack Be Nimble, Jack Be Thick

Book_Woodcutting.description: Felled trees have a 5% chance to yield double the wood.
Book_Woodcutting.name: Woody's Secret

Book_WildSeeds.description: Weeds have a greater chance to yield mixed seeds.
Book_WildSeeds.name: Raccoon Journal

Book_Roe.description: Fishing treasure chests have a chance to yield roe.
Book_Roe.name: Jewels Of The Sea

Book_Bombs.description: Bombs deal 25% less damage to you.
Book_Bombs.name: Dwarvish Safety Manual

Book_Crabbing.description: Crab pots have a 25% chance to yield double.
Book_Crabbing.name: The Art O' Crabbing

Book_Trash.description: You have a greater chance to find items in the trash.
Book_Trash.name: The Alleyway Buffet

Book_Diamonds.description: All stones have a chance to drop a diamond when mined by hand.
Book_Diamonds.name: The Diamond Hunter

Book_Mystery.description: You have a slightly greater chance to find Mystery Boxes.
Book_Mystery.name: Book of Mysteries

Book_Horse.description: You gain a little extra speed when riding a horse.
Book_Horse.name: Horse: The Book

Book_Artifact.description: You will fetch a better price when selling artifacts.
Book_Artifact.name: Treasure Appraisal Guide

Book_Grass.description: You will now run a lot faster through grass and crops.
Book_Grass.name: Ol' Slitherlegs

Book_AnimalCatalogue.description: You can access Marnie's shop when she's not around.
Book_AnimalCatalogue.name: Animal Catalogue

Mastery_Farming.description: You can now find Golden Animal Crackers, which permanently doubles a farm animal's produce. Doesn't work on pigs.
Mastery_Farming.name: Farming Mastery

Mastery_Fishing.description: You can now encounter Golden Fishing Chests.
Mastery_Fishing.name: Fishing Mastery

Mastery_Foraging.description: You now find Golden Mystery Boxes, which contain superior items.
Mastery_Foraging.name: Foraging Mastery

Mastery_Mining.description: Gem-bearing rocks now grant twice the gems.
Mastery_Mining.name: Mining Mastery

Mastery_Combat.description: Unlocks a new equipment slot for trinkets. Trinkets can be found while adventuring and grant special powers.
Mastery_Combat.name: Combat Mastery
